coreServices.name: Web Design & Development
coreServices.description: Responsive and modern websites, including portfolio, business, and eCommerce sites. Optimized for SEO and fast loading.

coreServices.name: Mobile App Development
coreServices.description: Cross-platform apps using Flutter for Android & iOS, with a focus on clean UI and strong UX.

coreServices.name: Desktop Application Development
coreServices.description: Custom software for Windows, including inventory, sales, POS, and utility apps. Lightweight and performance-optimized solutions.

coreServices.name: UI/UX Design
coreServices.description: Creation of wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for interactive and intuitive designs. Tools include Figma and Adobe XD.

coreServices.name: Cross-Platform Development
coreServices.description: Develop single codebase solutions for Web, Mobile & Desktop, focusing on scalable and maintainable architecture using Flutter, React, and Electron.js.

coreServices.name: Full Project Support for University Students
coreServices.description: End-to-end project development including documentation, UI/UX, and coding, tailored to final-year/university project needs.
